item.title: What Works Clearinghouse的实践指南
item.description: https://ies.ed.gov/ncee/wwc/ 教育科学研究所（IES）是美国教育部的统计，研究和评估部门。 IES是独立的，无党派的。 IES的使命是为教育实践和政策提供科学依据，并以教育

item.title: 美国AI教育政策
item.description: http://www.ptech.org/ P-TECH 9-14 School Model is a pioneering education reform initiative created by IBM, to prepare young people with the academic, technical and professional skills required for 21st Century Jobs and ongoing education. P-TECH represents the best of what public-private partnerships can look like, with students taking high school and college coursework simultaneously and engaging in industry-guided workforce development. https://innovation.ed.gov/files/2016/09/AIR-STEM2026_Report_2016.pdf 2016年9月，正值

item.title: 基于MOOC的学位课程：2018年MOOC统计和趋势的回顾

item.title: 2012年5月2日edX成立的报道

item.title: Open edX中的AI应用
item.description: Harvard University and Microsoft. ALOSI (Adaptive Learning Open Source Initiative) is based on creating an open source adaptive engine powering individualized learning and assessment pathways. Collaborative-based Personalization Zachary A. Pardos, Assistant Professor UC Berkeley Data-Driven Syllabus Adaptation Data & AI as a translation between expert/novice learner models RNNs langue models adapted to course navigation sequences. item.title: SREE:Advancing Education Research

item.title: 编写有效的基于问题的学习案例的5个最佳实践
